title: Caitlin Glass @ JAFAX 2022!
content:
We're excited to annouce that Caitlin Glass, an accomplished voice actor, ADR, and script writer will be joining the fun at JAFAX 2022!

Best known for lending her voice as Winry Rockbell in the "Full Metal Alchemist" franchises, has brought to life numerous other characters in animé and games, directed many well known and loved animé series, and lent her adaptive writing skills to several titles from Bang Zoom! Entertainment.

Take a look at her full bio to find out more!
